title: YOLO as Policy and Why EQ Is More Important Than IQ
description: Brighton Jones CEO Jon Jones, who took a year off to visit 35 countries with his family, insists that his employees also find balance in their lives.
itunes:author: Barron's Advisor
itunes:summary: Brighton Jones CEO Jon Jones, who took a year off to visit 35 countries with his family, insists that his employees also find balance in their lives.
